Docs.param: Request parameters that are provided to the validate move eligibility operation.
Docs.summary:
Validates if a subscription's charges can be moved to a new invoice section. This operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.
Request Path/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountName}/billingSubscriptions/{billingSubscriptionName}/validateMoveEligibility
Operation IdBillingSubscriptions_ValidateMoveEligibility
Default Api Version2021-10-01
Resource
